about_the_game:
Well, I'm Unikorn, a 3d artist, I've been working in the game industry all my life, making 3d models, free gay artworks, animations, and some free gay games.
I've always wanted to dive into a 3D game filled with handsome dudes, a story that grabs you, and all the fun stuff made with the gay community in mind.

2000 years later...

Well, I'll just do it myself! xD That's why The Chronicles of Lancelot came into existence!

Got a bunch of angels rolling in—shoutout to the game supporters on Itch, Deviant, and Twitter, plus my talented teammates helping me craft this lil' wild dream xD It's a blast (though sometimes it drives me nuts), and I'm hoping you guys have as much fun playing it as I do making it!

In this uproarious gay RPG adventure, players are transported to the whimsical world of Camelot, where swords whisper and treachery lurks in the shadows, Uther Pendragon forged Camelot with the legendary Excalibur. Among the children who grew up in the echoing halls were Lancelot, Arthur, Kay, and other Knights of the Round Table. However, their idyllic camaraderie crumbled when Uther's trusted ally, Ban, betrayed him, setting off a chain of events that would forever alter the course of Camelot.

Ban, Lancelot's father, poisoned Uther and stole Excalibur, leading to the abduction of Arthur. Justice came swiftly when Ector, Kay's father, avenged the betrayal by slaying Ban. Arthur survived, but Lancelot faced a different fate – captive, branded as the offspring of a traitor and thief.

Growing up in the cold shadows of scorn, Lancelot uncovered the twisted truths of his past. As Arthur embarked on a quest to reclaim Excalibur, their paths collided in a whirlwind of rivalry and love. Behind the clash of swords lay an unspoken bond that transcended the realms of friendship.

Lancelot is like smokin' hot and he'll surely have many "funny" moments with the hot guys. xD As players navigate the quirky world of Camelot, they'll engage in zany, turn-based battles against fantastical creatures that include sassy sprites and sarcastic trolls. But the real treasure lies in discovering the kingdom's "gay secrets," which are as numerous as they are hilarious. Players can unearth hidden romances, uncover Arthur's closet filled with sequined armor, and even participate in laugh-out-loud side quests that involve matchmaking for the kingdom's most love-stricken knights. With its side-splitting storyline, offbeat characters, and a multitude of campy surprises, this RPG delivers laughter, love, and a whole lot of fabulousness in the legendary land of Camelot.

So, welcome to the land of Camelot, where shadows gossip and Excalibur is just a distant glimmer. Here, Lancelot grows amidst the skepticism and disdain of the noble families around. Despite everything, Lance still emerges as a powerful and beautiful warrior, like a lotus rising from the mud.

As the player, besides the main quest of finding Excalibur, beating the beast, and dating Arthur, you'll have the delightful task of helping these charming knights discover their true loves, all while navigating witty banter, enchanting courtship rituals, and the occasional sword fight (with heart-shaped confetti, of course). Camelot Kingdom is a place where love is celebrated in all its forms, and you're the cupid with a quiver full of arrows, ready to unite these dashing knights and handsome suitors in a whirlwind of romance and laughter. Get ready for a legendary love story like no other!

Race: Human
Age: 19
Hometown: Benoic
Occupation: Warrior
Long story short: Brave, hot but dumb xD

Meet the remarkable Lancelot, a powerful fighter, skillful swordman, strapping 19-year-old who's so dashing, even the horses want to be him when they grow up. With his sun-kissed hair and a jawline so sharp, it's rumored that he once cut an apple with it just to impress a squirrel. Lancelot's got muscles that could put Hercules to shame, and a smile that makes the sun feel insecure about its brightness.

In the enchanting tapestry of Camelot's love stories, enter Lancelot, the dazzling lovechild of Camelot's resident troublemaker and the epitome of princely perfection, Arthur. Their love story is a quirky masterpiece, filled with glittery drama and unexpected twists. Lancelot waltzes through Camelot with a heart full of love and a flair for the dramatic. His love, much like his fashion sense, is anything but conventional.

Race: Elf
Age: 21
Hometown: Faldon Village, Pantheron Kingdom
Occupation: Wizard
Long story short: Sweet, but holding dark secrets

Meet James, the elf with more secrets than a magician's hat! Hailing from a picturesque village in the whimsical Pantheron Kingdom, why is he in Camelot? Well, this elf didn't cross half a kingdom just for the fish and chips. No, James came here on a quest to learn the mystical arts from the one and only Merlin. But here's the twist: he's got more secrets than Merlin has spell books. James has a knack for making even the simplest things seem like they're part of a grand magical mystery. As he weaves his way through Camelot, you can't help but wonder what in the realm he's hiding behind that pointy ear of his. In a kingdom where knights wield swords and wizards wave wands, James is the enigma that keeps everyone guessing, and you can bet your enchanted boots that hilarity and chaos are never too far behind him!

Race: Human
Age: 19
Hometown: Camelot
Occupation: Prince
Long story short: Prince Charming

With a body could make something melt and something hard and a jawline sharper than the sassiest comebacks at a royal roast, Arthur is the embodiment of princely fabulousness. But, here's the juicy gossip: his heart beats faster for none other than Lancelot, the knight whose charisma is as magnetic as a rainbow after a storm. Arthur's attempts to woo Lancelot are a comedy of errors that would make even the most seasoned court jesters envious. He can lead armies into battle while twirling in a sequined cape, but when it comes to courting Lancelot, he's as graceful as a flamingo wearing glass slippers on an ice rink. His love for Lancelot is a secret so well-guarded that even the kingdom's most flamboyant gossip queens can't spill the tea, and believe us, they've tried.

Race: Human
Age: 18
Hometown: Camelot
Occupation: Knight
Long story short: Mean boy

His grandmother is an elf so Kay has some elfy features, Kay is typically depicted as a skilled and valiant knight. He is known for his loyalty to Arthur and often serves as one of the prince's most trusted companions. However, he can also display a gruff and sometimes irritable demeanor. But here's the twist: Kay's heart beats to a different rhythm, and it's not for the typical damsels in distress. No, Kay is as gay as a unicorn wearing glittered horseshoes.

Species: Satyr
Age: 3000+
Hometown: SylvanGlam Woods
Occupation: Guardian
Long story short: Immortal magical creature gets bored

Allow me to introduce you to Aricen, the flamboyantly fabulous gay satyr who rules over the most enchanted corner of Camelot's woods. Aricen has a penchant for playing love games with the unsuspecting visitors who wander into his domain. When prince Arthur stumbled into his forest one day, Aricen couldn't resist the chance to add a little more drama to Camelot's courtly affairs.

Species: Human
Age: 25
Hometown: Camelot
Occupation: Servant
Long story short: The Hulk

Meet Asher, the towering tower of muscle with skin as smooth as the royal silk sheets and a secret that's juicier than a barrel of mead. As Arthur's devoted servant, he's not just a hunk; he's a full-blown Herculean hunk who makes knights blush and damsels swoon.

When he's not busy carrying Arthur on his bulging biceps or rescuing cats from trees (yes, even knights get stuck sometimes), Asher spends his free time designing elaborate love potions, all while secretly swooning over Sir Lancelot. He's the mastermind behind the castle's most scandalous love triangles and the architect of Camelot's most fabulous ballroom dances.

Species: Omni

Age: 22
Hometown: The Outerrealms
Occupation: Assassin
Long story short: The cold blood

Meet Thalindor, the devilishly handsome, half-human, half-demon assassin who was sent on a mission to Camelot with a heart as cold as his demonic lineage. With eyes that hold the secrets of the underworld, Thalindor is the embodiment of dark allure.

But here's where things get intriguing: Fate had other plans for Thalindor when he set foot in Camelot. Instead of fulfilling his sinister mission to eliminate Prince Arthur, he found himself irresistibly drawn to Sir Lancelot, the charismatic knight whose aura of bravery and charm was as blinding as Excalibur. As Thalindor tried to keep his deadly purpose hidden, he soon realized that love had a funny way of messing up even the most diabolical of plans.

  • Full 3D gay role-playing experience with some NSFW elements.

  • Meet muscular, attractive characters with 6 intimate characters and more.

  • Enjoy 10+ funny and intimate scenes.

  • Engage in a turn-based RPG system inspired by Final Fantasy.

  • Embark on quests and master powerful magic and skills.

  • Do all funny gay things in a fantasy world.

Special Rewards won't have in the Standard version:

Fantasy Go-Go Boy Dance Club.

1 extra dungeon and side story

1 extra intimate character and NSFW scene

Meet Gawain

Gawain is unlike any character you've encountered in our game before. He is a golden boy with a flawless physique, strikingly handsome, and incredibly arrogant. Gawain's presence is sure to turn heads and chances are, he will be the most handsome video game character of the year. xD

A lil bit later

Gawain is the golden boy so he's in the Gold version only xD

content_descriptors.notes:
Regarding sexual content, players may encounter scenes that depict consensual sexual activity between adult male characters. Additionally, there may be instances where sexual assault or non-consensual sex is portrayed as part of the narrative. We handle such sensitive topics with care and respect, ensuring they are presented in a thoughtful manner that contributes meaningfully to the story arc.

It's important for players to be aware of these themes and depictions before engaging with our game, as they may evoke strong emotions or trigger sensitivities. We strive to provide a compelling and immersive gaming experience while also respecting the diverse perspectives and boundaries of our players. As such, we encourage individuals to assess whether our game aligns with their preferences and comfort levels before playing.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i3-9100F or Ryzen 3 3100
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX 1060 3GB
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 6 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Realtek ALC887
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i7-10700K or AMD Ryzen 7 3700X
  • Memory: 32 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX 2080
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 6 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Creative Sound Blaster Audigy FX

short_description: Embark on an adventure in the world of Arthurian, have fun with hot and handsome knights, rescue the prince, do all kinds of funny gay stuff, and become the most fabulous gay knight in this NSFW RPG game inspired by Arthurian legends and Final Fantasy.
